The page title is : “RESEARCH AREA. Transportation”
The subtitle is : Dense urban grids. Self-driving vehicles. Alternative fuels. How might we redesign mobility to unlock efficiency and urban growth?

Behind the title section is a black and white image of the wires suspended in the sky above a bus stop.

I found 3 page sections laid out vertically. Would you like me to read them out or do something else?
